director.name: 米罗斯拉夫·曼迪奇 Miroslav Mandic

introduction: As the war in Sarajevo begins, people are leaving valuables in the house of a beautiful woman who intends to stay. A little boy and his family are leaving too. Nobody ever came back to pick up their things. Years after, the boy returns as a grown-up, and all he finds in the woman’s house are stacked up, useless valuables. And memories of a woman he adored as a boy.
